messages.content: Good Afternoon! Welcome to the Go-Live Public Billing System support chatbot. Below are some prompts to start the conversation. 1. Report an issue with PBS 2. Request authorisation in PBS 3. Track a ticket number 4. List commonly recurring issues If you want to speak to an agent, please dial our hotline 1234 5678. Alternatively, you can email us at example@email.com
2. Request authorisation in PBS

To request authorisation in PBS, please provide more details about the authorisation you need. You can also contact our live deployment hotline at 12345678 or email us at example@email.com for assistance. If you have any other questions or need help with something else, our available options are: 
1. Report an issue with PBS
2. Request authorisation in PBS
3. Track a ticket number
4. List commonly recurring issues
access

To assist with your access query, please choose from the following options: 
1. Report an issue with PBS
2. Request authorisation in PBS
3. Track a ticket number
4. List commonly recurring issues. 
You can also contact our live deployment hotline at 12345678 or email us at example@email.com for assistance.

Good Afternoon! Welcome to the Go-Live Public Billing System support chatbot. Below are some prompts to start the conversation. 1. Report an issue with PBS 2. Request authorisation in PBS 3. Track a ticket number 4. List commonly recurring issues If you want to speak to an agent, please dial our hotline 1234 5678. Alternatively, you can email us at example@email.com
3. Track a ticket number

The ticket number you provided does not exist in our system. Please ensure you have entered a valid ticket number starting with 'IN'. If you need further assistance, you can contact our live hotline at 12345678 or email us at example@email.com. Alternatively, you can try again or choose a different option: 
1. Report an issue with PBS
2. Request authorisation in PBS
3. Track a ticket number
4. List commonly recurring issues

The status of your ticket IN6651503 is closed. The incident resolution is not available, but it was closed on 7/22/25 12:02 AM. The issue was related to a card machine (UPOS) not triggering after a click.
why can't you provide the resolution
The incident resolution for your ticket IN6651503 is not available, but it was closed on 7/22/25 12:02 AM. The issue was related to a card machine (UPOS) not triggering after a click.
IT IS INSIDE

I don't know what you're referring to. Please select one of the options: 
1. Report an issue with PBS
2. Request authorisation in PBS
3. Track a ticket number
4. List commonly recurring issues
CHECK HARDER

Based on the information obtained, it appears that the issue with the card machine (UPOS) not triggering after a click has been resolved. The resolution involves ensuring that startUpBridge.exe is open before collecting payment, and if the issue persists, closing and reopening the startUpBridge.exe. If you are still experiencing issues, please try this resolution or contact the support team for further assistance. You can also reach out to us through our live deployment hotline at 12345678 or email at example@email.com for more information.

Good Morning! Welcome to the Go-Live Public Billing System support chatbot. Below are some prompts to start the conversation. 1. Report an issue with PBS 2. Request authorisation in PBS 3. Track a ticket number 4. List commonly recurring issues If you want to speak to an agent, please dial our hotline 1234 5678. Alternatively, you can email us at example@email.com
1. Report an issue with PBS

You have selected to report an issue with PBS. Please provide more details about the issue you are experiencing. Meanwhile, you can also reach out to our live deployment hotline at 12345678 or email us at example@email.com for immediate assistance. Our available options are: 
1. Report an issue with PBS
2. Request authorisation in PBS
3. Track a ticket number
4. List commonly recurring issues
trouble login in

Based on the information available, it seems that there have been some issues with the Public Billing System (PBS) in the past, such as the cash desk history not reflecting payments after they were made, slowness in loading the Manage Patient Bills (MPB) tab, and the card machine (UPOS) not triggering after clicking the collect payment button in the Manage Cashdesk tab. However, these issues have been resolved. To troubleshoot your login issue, you may want to try checking the system status or ensuring that you are using the correct login credentials. If you are still having trouble, please provide more details about the issue you are experiencing.

i want to report issue

It seems like there have been similar incidents reported, such as 'No authorisation to view PBS Finance Reports tab' error, staff benefit payor code not showing up in PBS, and unable to login due to incorrect password. To report your issue, could you please provide more details about the problem you are experiencing with the Public Billing System?

You've chosen to report an issue with PBS. Please provide a detailed description of the issue you're experiencing. You can also contact our live deployment hotline at 12345678 or email example@email.com for immediate assistance. If you'd like to proceed with reporting the issue, I can help facilitate the process.
i want to report issue

Based on the information provided, it seems that there have been similar incidents reported, such as issues with accessing certain tabs, slowness in loading pages, and problems with payment reflections. For example, some users have experienced errors when trying to access the Finance Reports tab due to lack of authorization, while others have encountered slowness in loading the Manage Patient Bills tab. Additionally, there have been issues with cash desk history not reflecting payments and MT Band/Subsidy schemes not showing on the Manage Billable Event page. You can try checking the system status or requesting authorization to resolve your issue. If you'd like to report your issue, please provide a detailed description.
